question:
You recently bought an electric gadget for your home. Your friend wants the same gadget and needs your advice. In this letter you should include:

What the gadget is
What you think about it
Advice about other alternatives your friend could buy
text: I hope you are in the best of health and spirit. Although we have not met for a long, I still reminisce about the time we spent together at my home last month. I am writing this letter in regard to your letter wherein you are seeking my views about the electric chimney that I recently bought for my home.

Firstly, to state the product in detail, I bought a fully automatic chimney of the Bajaj brand for my kitchen. Since the older one was damaged and was not functioning properly, I bought it online after searching at various vendors. It is a five-star electric appliance and has the facility of in-built auto clean mode in it. I have been searching for the same for the last one month. Moreover, it cost me quite reasonable at just $10.

Since this is the second variant that had been purchased by me, as per my perspective, I believe both the products hold  their own significance. However, the automatic version of it is quite easy to use, besides that, its feature of auto- clean makes it worth buying. I am really enjoying this purchase.

Furthermore,as you are also planning to buy this item. I recommend that you should try the range of varieties available at the online Amazon store as per your requirement. However, I advise you to buy the manual version first, because, as per your price range it will not only be very reasonable for you in terms of money, but being only two people in your home, it is also appropriate as per your family needs. Further, you can also search for the Sunshine Brand products, as they are quite reasonable and can suit you very well.
I hope my advice and experience will benefit you in buying an appropriate thing.
